programme.title: Love Endures
programme.desc: Huang Ying Zi hoped everyone would return to Hangtian City for Guan Chao's wedding, but they all turned down the invitation. She returns to Hangtian City alone and is surprised to find Zhuang Yuan has rushed back too.

programme.title: Love Endures
programme.desc: Huang Ying Zi and Zhuang Yuan hear that Guan Chao's parents won't be attending his wedding. Huang Ying Zi decides to come up with ideas to convince Guan Chao's father.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Si Yuan tries to help her parents reconcile; Chen Shi accommodates but continues to think of Yu Ting and secretly keeps in touch with her. After dinner, Chen Shi makes up an excuse to look for Yu Ting and Lin Li is heartbroken. Dong Sheng feels heartache over Lin Li's predicament and decides to protect her.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Wen Yu does a livestream in a restaurant to introduce new products. Netizens suggest that she watches Chen Ming's livestream after they sense that she is not in a good mood. Chen Ming helps Wen Yu, causing her to feel awkward and hoping that she will not bump into him again.

programme.title: Detective Dee and the Dragon of Fire
programme.desc: The newly constructed Luoyang Palace is set ablaze by a divine dragon during the night, leaving the carpenter either dead or missing. Di Renjie, breaking the norms, is promoted to the position of Deputy Minister of the Supreme Court to investigate the case but encounters obstacles from a mysterious force.

programme.title: American Moments
programme.desc: Feng and Shane share how they created the Szechuan Noodle brand that received recognition from the western world, including big names such as Jonathan Gold.

programme.title: Boiling Pot
programme.desc: To understand the personalities of the locals, you have to dive into their food and culture. Chef Li introduces Noelle to sea cucumber.

programme.title: Ghost Soldier Borrowed
programme.desc: Detective Dee investigates a murder encountering eerie events and malevolent forces as he delves deeper into the case.

programme.title: Better Plan for Better Life
programme.desc: In the new era of intelligent manufacturing, scientific and technological achievement intertwine with family life through high-speed rail, smart homes, global online shopping, convenient smart phone mobile platforms, and cashless payments.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: When Su Jin Er meets with Zi Dan, his only concern was Wang Xuan's recent situation giving her mixed feelings about it.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: Xie Wan Ru goes into labor prematurely and Zi Long awaits patiently.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne
programme.desc: Apple wants to borrow money. Although Lai-kei is reluctant, she has second thoughts as Apple mentions some old story.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne
programme.desc: Ho-yee is not making up with Ko Tsun, who feels helpless.

programme.title: Love Endures
programme.desc: Huang Ying Zi and Zhuang Yuan are forced into a blind date at a café. While playing along, secretly they are discussing Jiang Yi. Huang Ying Zi finds Jiang Yi's actions a bit cryptic.

programme.title: Love Endures
programme.desc: Huang Ying Zi recalls the day they played Truth or Dare when Jiang Yi chose not to reveal his answer. In hindsight, Huang Ying Zi realizes that Jiang Yi might be the one she truly has a crush on.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Yu Ting feels uneasy that Chen Shi's family is going on an overseas trip then gets into a car accident. Mr. Pang, who was with Yu Ting, informs Chen Shi. Chen Shi rushes to the hospital and hugs Yu Ting tightly, Mr. Pang is stunned at the sight. Yu Ting chooses not to repress her feelings any longer and decides to stay beside Chen Shi no matter what.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Lin Li has a face-off with Yu Ting. Yu Ting tries to taunt Lin Li by telling her how well she and Chen Shi suit each other - working well and having similar interests. However, Lin Li tells Yu Ting about her 15 years of marriage to Chen Shi, and that the two have definitely been through more than Chen Shi and Yu Ting have; Yu Ting argues that all these are in the past.

programme.title: Ghost Soldier Borrowed
programme.desc: Detective Dee investigates a murder encountering eerie events and malevolent forces as he delves deeper into the case.

programme.title: The Glory of Global Chinese
programme.desc: Experience Jake Pinnick’s extraordinary odyssey from Wudang Mountain, an acclaimed UNESCO World Heritage site and birthplace of Taoist martial arts, to mastering ancient kung fu and Taoist music, forging a transcultural bridge between Eastern and Western civilizations through the universal wisdom of Taoist philosophy.
